short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of the ugly X-twitter new logo? This 16-line code extension will resurrect lovely BlueBird for your eyes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension replaces the Twitter X-logo on the left menu and browser tab title with the BlueBird logo. Nothing more, super simple and safe.
